item.title: Fed's John Williams stresses independence as Trump moves to fire Lisa Cook
item.description: The influential policymaker avoided commenting directly on Trump's efforts to fire Cook.

item.title: Wealthy Americans are traveling to Europe to dodge tariffs on luxury goods
item.description: Travelers could score discounts on high-end items like watches and clothing by buying overseas. However, the strategy comes with risks.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Kohl's, MongoDB, Canada Goose, Cracker Barrel and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in early trading.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: MongoDB, Okta, PVH and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

item.title: How BlackRock and Goldman Sachs are bringing Wall Street's hottest asset class to 401(k)s
item.description: "The alternative market is becoming less alternative," BlackRock's Jon Diorio said. "It's growing very rapidly as public markets are shrinking."
